name: phpmyadmin
description: A web interface for MySQL and MariaDB
author: The phpMyAdmin Team <developers@phpmyadmin.net> (https://www.phpmyadmin.net/team/)

scripts.build: yarn run css-compile --style=compressed && yarn run css-prefix && yarn run css-rtl && yarn run js-compile
scripts.css-rtl: yarn run rtlcss -c .rtlcssrc.json themes/bootstrap/css/theme.css && yarn run rtlcss -c .rtlcssrc.json themes/pmahomme/css/theme.css && yarn run rtlcss -c .rtlcssrc.json themes/original/css/theme.css && yarn run rtlcss -c .rtlcssrc.json themes/metro/css/theme.css && yarn run rtlcss -c .rtlcssrc.json themes/metro/css/blueeyes-theme.css && yarn run rtlcss -c .rtlcssrc.json themes/metro/css/mono-theme.css && yarn run rtlcss -c .rtlcssrc.json themes/metro/css/redmond-theme.css && yarn run rtlcss -c .rtlcssrc.json themes/metro/css/teal-theme.css
